text: The Smoothie King Franchises Inc (better known as just the Smoothie King) is an American smoothie company. It was founded in Kenner, Louisiana in 1973. The Smoothie King is privately owned by a South Korean franchisee from 2012 and after. ==References== Category:Companies based in Louisiana Category:Juice Category:1973 establishments in the United States Category:1970s establishments in Louisiana
title: Smoothie King
